apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji on Apple devices showcases two men sharing a loving kiss, with one depicted in a medium skin tone and the other in a medium-light skin tone. Apple's design language brings them to life with soft, rounded edges and a gentle, realistic lighting that highlights their connection and affection. The subtle blush on their cheeks and the warm embrace convey a sense of intimacy and romantic devotion, ideal for expressing love and partnership between men in your messages on Apple devices.
